Package com.provigil.surveillance.calculator.service

Interface SurveillanceSubscriptionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SurveillanceSubscriptionServiceImpl
    public interface SurveillanceSubscriptionService
    This is a service to calculate Surveillance monthly costs.
    Author:
    Pradeep Velpula

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • calculateMonthlyCost

        java.lang.Double calculateMonthlyCost​(SurveillanceSubscription surveillanceSubscription)
        Calculates the monthly cost for the provided subscription.
        Parameters:
        surveillanceSubscription - subscription for which monthly cost needs to be calculated.
        Returns:
        the calculated monthly cost

      • getMonthlyCostXml

        java.io.InputStream getMonthlyCostXml​(java.io.File subscriptionsXmlFile)
        Generates an XML InputStream which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions XML file.

        Example of input subscriptionsXmlFile whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <subscriptions>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <area>2500</area>
   <plan>MONTHLY</plan>
   <location>Indoor</location>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <area>4000</area>
   <plan>YEARLY</plan>
   <location>Outdoor</location>
  </subscription>
 </subscription>
        Example of the returned XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult 
         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <result>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <cost>5000</cost>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <cost>6500</cost>
  </subscription>
 </result>
        If there is any error while calculating a subscription, then error element replaces cost element.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionsXmlFile - subscriptions XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult

      • getMonthlyCostXml

        java.io.InputStream getMonthlyCostXml​(java.io.InputStream subscriptionsXmlInputStream)
        Generates an XML InputStream which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions XML InputStream.

        Example of input subscriptionsXmlInputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <subscriptions>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <area>2500</area>
   <plan>MONTHLY</plan>
   <location>Indoor</location>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <area>4000</area>
   <plan>YEARLY</plan>
   <location>Outdoor</location>
  </subscription>
 </subscription>
        Example of the returned XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult 
         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <result>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <cost>5000</cost>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <cost>6500</cost>
  </subscription>
 </result>
        If there is any error while calculating a subscription, then error element replaces cost element.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionsXmlInputStream - an InputStream containing XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult

      • getMonthlyCostXml

        java.io.InputStream getMonthlyCostXml​(java.io.Reader subscriptionsXmlReader)
        Generates an XML InputStream which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions XML Reader.

        Example of input subscriptionsXmlReader whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <subscriptions>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <area>2500</area>
   <plan>MONTHLY</plan>
   <location>Indoor</location>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <area>4000</area>
   <plan>YEARLY</plan>
   <location>Outdoor</location>
  </subscription>
 </subscription>
        Example of the returned XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult 
         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <result>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <cost>5000</cost>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <cost>6500</cost>
  </subscription>
 </result>
        If there is any error while calculating a subscription, then error element replaces cost element.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionsXmlReader - an Reader containing XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult

      • getMonthlyCostXml

        java.io.InputStream getMonthlyCostXml​(SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest surveillanceCostCalculatorRequest)
        Generates an XML InputStream which contains the calculated costs for the provided request object SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. cost and error are not required and will be ignored.

        Example of the returned XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <result>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <cost>5000</cost>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <cost>6500</cost>
  </subscription>
 </result>
        If there is any error while calculating a subscription, then error element replaces cost element.
        Parameters:
        surveillanceCostCalculatorRequest - request object SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest for which costs needs to be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        XML InputStream whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult

      • getMonthlyCostResult

        SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult getMonthlyCostResult​(java.io.File subscriptionsXmlFile)
        Generates SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions XML file.

        Example of input file subscriptionsXmlFile whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <subscriptions>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <area>2500</area>
   <plan>MONTHLY</plan>
   <location>Indoor</location>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <area>4000</area>
   <plan>YEARLY</plan>
   <location>Outdoor</location>
  </subscription>
 </subscription>
        Parameters:
        subscriptionsXmlFile - a File object containing XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        an instance of SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs.

      • getMonthlyCostResult

        SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult getMonthlyCostResult​(java.io.InputStream subscriptionsXmlInputStream)
        Generates SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions XML InputStream.

        Example of input stream subscriptionsXmlInputStream which contains XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <subscriptions>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <area>2500</area>
   <plan>MONTHLY</plan>
   <location>Indoor</location>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <area>4000</area>
   <plan>YEARLY</plan>
   <location>Outdoor</location>
  </subscription>
 </subscription>
        Parameters:
        subscriptionsXmlInputStream - an InputStream object containing XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        an instance of SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs.

      • getMonthlyCostResult

        SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult getMonthlyCostResult​(java.io.Reader subscriptionsXmlReader)
        Generates SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions XML Reader.

        Example of reader subscriptionsXmlReader which contains XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest 

         
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <subscriptions>
  <subscription>
   <id>1</id>
   <area>2500</area>
   <plan>MONTHLY</plan>
   <location>Indoor</location>
  </subscription>
  <subscription>
   <id>2</id>
   <area>4000</area>
   <plan>YEARLY</plan>
   <location>Outdoor</location>
  </subscription>
 </subscription>
        Parameters:
        subscriptionsXmlReader - a Reader object containing XML whose element structure maps to SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        an instance of SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs.

      • getMonthlyCostResult

        SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult getMonthlyCostResult​(SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest surveillanceCostCalculatorRequest)
        Generates SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs for the provided subscriptions SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest.
        Parameters:
        surveillanceCostCalculatorRequest - a SurveillanceMonthlyCostRequest containing subscriptions. Costs will be calculated for each SurveillanceSubscription.
        Returns:
        an instance of SurveillanceMonthlyCostResult which contains the calculated costs.
